Putting Passenger Standalone behind an Nginx or Apache reverse proxy

Posted on April 1, 2017

In some cases, you may want to put Passenger Standalone behind a reverse proxy. The reverse proxy can for example be Nginx, Apache or HAProxy. The reverse proxy listens on port 80 (or any other port you want) and is responsible for accepting HTTP requests. The reverse proxy then determines... [Read More]
